Wreak Havoc as the Top Cat!

editorialNotes.standard: Adventure across a modern cityscape filled with raids, dungeons and lots of monsters in this gorgeous action RPG based on the popular webtoon.
Smash monsters, wield awesome weapons and explore an unforgettable megacity in this cyberpunk adventure from the makers of Genshin Impact and Honkai: Star Rail.
Here comes the wave! In this gorgeous open-world RPG, explore eroded landscapes, battle otherworldly creatures and unlock incredible skills.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Fun with the talking pet cat!

editorialNotes.standard: If you’ve ever dreamed of ruling your own fantasy world populated with scaly serpents and other mythical beasties, Dragon City is a treasure trove. It’s delightfully satisfying to breed, hatch, and raise dragons with an array of elemental abilities, and then enter them in Pokémon-style battles against friends or exciting league tournaments. If you’re a more peaceful dragon-lord in search of relaxation, simply clear land, build habitats, and develop enough farms to feed your ever-growing population of wily wyverns.

editorialNotes.short: Hop on the Astral Express and live interplanetary adventures.

editorialNotes.standard: DJing requires skill, attention to craft and hours of practice. But this free app can help. It teaches and simplifies the process of audio mixing through a slick, Apple Design Award–winning visual interface.
No magic? No problem! Recruit heroes as you train to become the Wizard King in this vibrant auto-battling RPG.
Carve out a new homeland by rallying Viking heroes to build cities and command armies over land and sea in this captivating strategy game.

ios.subtitle: Cook Up A Storm At Festivals!

editorialNotes.standard: Seeking cool new Star Wars characters blasting away on smartly designed, nostalgic maps? This is the team-based battler you’re looking for.

The mobile version of this stealthy adventure truly mirrors its console and PC counterparts. Nowhere is off limits as you scale buildings, leap from heights and dash through crowded streets, all while staying stealth on the hunt for your targets.

editorialNotes.standard: This digital notepad and PDF markup tool covers all the bases. Create notes with your keyboard or Apple Pencil: the app transforms your hand-drawn shapes into perfect ones, and can even convert your handwriting to text.
